result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Case Called: 2:32 pm
INCLUDES 20CM1172 & 22CM297.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher in person:
Defendant appears in person and with Atty Paige Metzman in person;
VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. State moves to:
22CM297:
Ct. 1 (Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal))>>DRI.
Ct. 2 (BJ)>>DRI.

COURT GRANTS ABOVE.

PLEA:
20CM1172:
Ct. 1 (BJ)>> NO CONTEST.
Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
20CM1172:
Ct. 1 (BJ)>> Court Costs, DNA Sample and Surcharge.
Defendant has 30 Days to pay amount in full and if unable to do so, Defendant to set up a Payment Plan with the Clerk of Court's Office.

Adjourned: 2:40 pm
Plea/sentencing hearing on June 8, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

records.addlTxt: INCLUDES 20CM1172 & 22CM297: Absolute sobriety from, and no possession of alcohol.   Shall not drive a motor vehicle without valid driver's license.   Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (1) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Clerk: Amanda.
Cases called at 2:35 pm.
INCLUDES: 20CM1172 & 22CM297.
State appears by ADA Cody Marschall. Defendant appears from MCJ, and by Attorney Paige Metzman. 
Date and Time set for IA; VRCW. 

COURT QUASHES WARRANT. 

Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 

PLEA:  NOT GUILTY. 

COURT ORDERS: $750 signature bond - CONDITIONS: 
- Absolute sobriety from, and no possession of alcohol. 
- No driving without a valid license. 

- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 1 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

>>FUTURE DATES: 
PTC: 4/21 at 10 w/JA

Adj: 2:37 pm.
